title: Modeling Classroom Engagement Through Conceptual Competencies: Mathematical Activity Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A large-scale online environment aimed at strengthening graduate-level mathematical thinking skills. Students advance conceptual understanding by applying mathematical theories to practical activities.

learning_goals: Students can analyze structural features of participation topography when designing activities using mathematical kinematics concepts
Learners can visualize and evaluate movement affordances within activity territories using digital tools
Participants can explain the correlation between conceptual competence and participation levels through peer feedback and case studies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
